Prop.Name: ScrollDirection
Prop.Description: This attribute determines the direction of the scroll.

Prop.Name: SnapToGrid
Prop.Description: This attribute determines if the grid items snaps to edges when scrolling.

Prop.Name: ItemsLayoutMode
Prop.Description: This attribute determines if the grid contains multiple items per row if ScrollDirection=Vertical or items per column if ScrollDirection=Horizontal.

Prop.Name: ItemsPerRow
Prop.Description: This attribute determines how many items per row are shown.

Prop.Name: ItemsPerColumn
Prop.Description: This attribute determines how many items per column are shown.

Prop.Name: MinimumWidth
Prop.Description: This attribute determines the number of columns, the grid will fit as many columns as possible with at least this width, 0 means to use all width.

Prop.Name: MaximumWidth
Prop.Description: This attribute determines the maximum width of the columns, 0 means no maximum.

Prop.Name: MinimumHeight
Prop.Description: This attribute determines the number of rows, the grid will fit as many rows as possible with at least this height, 0 means to use all height.

Prop.Name: MaximumHeight
Prop.Description: This attribute determines the maximum height of the rows, 0 means no maximum.
